title: Reading planet
creator_credit: H G Simons Productions, Study Sources Unlimited and Pawel Kuczynski
brief_description: Prism a young alien from the planet Reading is given the task of improving the reading skills of five earth students. Through their various adventures the audience is introduced to techniques such as deriving meaning from context, visualisation, etc.
creator_credit_for_label: H G Simons Productions, Study Sources Unlimited and Pawel Kuczynski
